mapper.select: SELECT item_no, item_name, item_effect, item_img, item_purchase_no, item_stock, item_category FROM ( SELECT i.item_no, i.item_name, i.item_effect, i.item_img, p.item_purchase_no, SUM(p.item_stock) AS item_stock, i.item_category FROM item_purchase p JOIN item i ON p.item_no = i.item_no WHERE p.buyer_nickname = #{nickname} AND p.item_stock > 0 GROUP BY i.item_no, i.item_name, i.item_effect, i.item_img, p.item_purchase_no ) AS grouped_result ORDER BY item_purchase_no LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item_purchase ip , item i WHERE i.item_no = ip.item_no AND item_stock > 0 AND i.item_category = 'Y'
